alert.note: Alert for Somerset (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 12 at 3:40AM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Somerset County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. BISHOPS HEAD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.2 FT, MODERATE 3.7 FT, MAJOR 4.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.1 FT, MODERATE 1.6 FT, MAJOR 2.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/02 AM 2.4 0.3 1.1 1 NONE 12/02 PM 2.8 0.7 1.0 1-2 NONE 13/03 AM 4.2 2.1 2.8 3 MODERATE 13/03 PM 3.9 1.8 2.1 3 MODERATE 14/03 AM 2.8 0.7 1.3 2 NONE 14/03 PM 2.2 0.1 0.5 2 NONE CRISFIELD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.5 FT, MODERATE 4.0 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.3 FT, MODERATE 1.8 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/01 PM 2.6 0.4 0.1 1 NONE 13/02 AM 3.5 1.3 1.8 1 NONE 13/02 PM 4.1 1.9 1.6 1 MODERATE 14/02 AM 2.2 0.0 0.4 1 NONE 14/03 PM 2.8 0.6 0.4 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
